assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: America's Car-Mart, Inc., through its subsidiaries, operates as an automotive retailer in the United States. The company primarily sells older model used vehicles and provides financing for its customers. As of April 30, 2021, it operated 151 dealerships in the South-Central United States. America's Car-Mart, Inc. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Rogers, Arkansas.
